## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                           | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | svg size in px, em, rem, %,...        | `string` | `"32px"`    |
| `svg`    | `svg`     | asset as string                       | `string` | `""`        |
| `url`    | `url`     | asset url,can be relative or absolute | `string` | `undefined` |
